means: 使开化( civilize的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Yesterday's testimony began on a note of passionate but civilized disagreement.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天的作供是在激烈但文明地表达分歧的氛围中开始的。

sentence.Network_en: I believed that in civilized countries, torture had ended long ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 我原以为在文明国家，严刑拷打早已销声匿迹。

sentence.Network_en: Racism is abhorrent to a civilized society.
sentence.Network_cn: 文明社会憎恶种族主义。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 除此以外, 弗格森对“文明”的看法是相当宽容的。他认为“文明的”(civilized) 和“有教养的” (polished) 这些词汇具有温情脉脉的色彩, 是基于欧洲传统和商业文明而产生.
建立一个以西方文明为核心的“文明化”(civilised)世界是欧盟的最终目标。时代不同，推展西方文明价值的方式自然也就不同，以前是依 …
Eating human flesh is a taboo in civilized countries ., 讲文明的国度以食人肉为忌.
cite 引用，举例civilized 文明的，开化的clash 冲突

list.abs: 这里需要说明一下本书中所使用的“文明”概念的内涵。“文明”(civilization)一词来源于拉丁文civis，而civis不仅是指罗马的公民身份，而且也含有比当时外国人或蛮族的原始生.
考博词汇下载（10000词汇完整版） - 豆丁网 ... citrus n． 柠檬； 柑橘 civilization n． 文明， 文化 civilize v． 使文明， 开化.
新加坡版中英文法律术语 - 豆丁网 ... citizen 公民；国民 civil 民事 civil action 民事诉讼.
民字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 民营〖 nongovernmentalbusiness〗 民用〖 civil;civilian;forciviluse〗 民怨〖 populardiscontent〗.
C开头的单词_百度文库 ... civilization n. 文明，文化；开化 civilize vt. 使文明；教育 claim vt. 声称，主张；索取.

entry.def: If you describe a society as civilized, you mean that it is advanced and has sensible laws and customs.

example.ex: I believed that in civilized countries, torture had ended long ago.
example.tran: 我原以为在文明国家，严刑拷打早已销声匿迹。

entry.tran: 有礼貌的;举止得体的;通情达理的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their behaviour as civilized, you mean that they are polite and reasonable.

example.ex: I wrote to my ex-wife. She was very civilised about it.
example.tran: 我给前妻写了封信。她对此很通情达理。

means.word_mean: 1. having a high state of culture and development both social and technological;

sentences.sentence: "terrorist acts that shocked the civilized world"

means.word_mean: 2. marked by refinement in taste and manners;

auth_sentence.content: Civilized by the joint influences of religion and of chivalry.
auth_sentence.res_content: Civilized by the joint influences of religion and of chivalry.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Civilized by the joint influences of religion and of chivalry.

auth_sentence.content: War...was the degradation of all civilized ideals.
auth_sentence.res_content: War...was the degradation of all civilized ideals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: War...was the degradation of all civilized ideals.

auth_sentence.content: A forecasting tendency, germinal in animals and...conspicuous in the civilized man.
auth_sentence.res_content: A forecasting tendency, germinal in animals and...conspicuous in the civilized man.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A forecasting tendency, germinal in animals and...conspicuous in the civilized man.

sentences.en: A civilized leader must eschew violence.
sentences.cn: 文明领导人必须避免使用暴力。

sentences.en: Let’s discuss this like civilized people.
sentences.cn: 让我们像文明人一样心平气和地讨论。

sentences.en: China is a highly civilized country.
sentences.cn: 中国是一个高度文明的国家。

sentences.en: Haas was quite pleasant, very civilized.
sentences.cn: 哈斯很招人喜欢，很有礼貌。

sentences.en: They’re brutal people behind their civilized veneer.
sentences.cn: 他们表面上温文有礼，骨子里却是野蛮残忍。
